{{Quote|I tried to do as little as possible, because I was kind of aware of the dangers in portraying a character who has a weird way of talking, and who looks kind of weird and who has magical abilities...I just tried to downplay it and kind of think the things that I'm saying.|'''Tom Wlaschiha''' on playing Jaqen<ref>''The SFX Book of Game of Thrones''</ref>}}
'''Tom Wlaschia''' (born 20 June, 1973) is a German actor. His ancestors were ethnic Czechs who came to Germany around the beginning of the 19th Century, hence his Czech-sounding surname. He has appeared in films including ''[[wikipedia:Enemy at the Gates (film)|Enemy at the Gates]]'', ''[[wikipedia:Munich (film)|Munich]]'', ''[[wikipedia:Brideshead Revisited (film)|Brideshead Revisited]]'' and ''[[wikipedia:Valkyrie (film)|Valkyrie]]''.

In ''[[Game of Thrones]]'' he is playing the role of [[Jaqen H'ghar]]. He was confirmed in the role on 3 August 2010.<ref>[http://winter-is-coming.net/2011/08/exclusive-tom-wlaschiha-is-jaqen-hghar/ Winter is Coming]</ref> He joined the cast as a guest star in the [[Season 2|second season]].

It is reported that Tom will be inÂ [[Season 5]]<ref>[http://winteriscoming.net/2014/06/23/familiar-face-returning-game-thrones-season-5/]</ref>, however his role is still unknown.
